divs: Sighting DetailsWe stopped in the parking lot for Albertson's and got out of the car. What I heard next sounded kind of like a waving, muffled sound. I at first thought it was a stealth bomber, because of the shape of the object, which was difficult to discern. There were three three white lights that were very still, and there was a blinking light in the center that was white and blue. It was low enough that if I were standing on the roof of the grocery store, I could have almost touched it. It was moving exceptionally slow, almost stationary. I then went into the store for maybe a minute or so, came out, and it was completely gone. To note, right after this, the F-16 fighters from the nearby airforce base (Hill) started to fly into the sky in the general direction of where the object was.
Summary: UFO over Albertson's in Clearfield, UT
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Clearfield
There were no other sightings in Clearfield on or around March 10th 2008
